corrected_nouns: signals, division, wavelength, signal, demultiplexers, fiber, multiplexing, number, receiver, demux, repeaters, mode, head, space
abstract: A multi-mode wavelength-division multiplexing (WDM) receiver includes a receiver head to receive a free-space optical (FSO) signal. A multi-mode demultiplexers (demux) is coupled to the receiver head via a multi-mode fiber to generate a number of optical signals based on the FSO signal. A number of repeaters modify the optical signals and generate a number of single-mode optical signals.

corrected_nouns: problems, industry, lowering, disclosure, sulfide, compositions, oil, coal, formaldehyde, adducts, mercaptans, products, embodiments, methods, gas, hydrogen
abstract: The disclosure provides compositions and methods that are useful in removing, lowering, or otherwise controlling hydrogen sulfide and mercaptans. The compositions and methods can be used in any industry where hydrogen sulfide poses problems, such as when dealing with crude oil based, natural gas based, and/or coal based products. In some embodiments, the compositions include one or more alkoxylated amino formaldehyde adducts.
